name: Jigsaw Puzzles for Me
description:
Welcome to Jigsaw Puzzles for Me - an app that is filled with hundreds of high-quality images, carefully sorted into categories. There’s no time to get bored - new pics are added every day! 6 levels of difficulty will satisfy either a hardened gaming veteran whose 2nd name is “Challenge”, or a more casual player. Now, get comfortable, relax, and dive into the world of amazing jigsaw puzzles!

Features:
* A variety of handpicked HQ images carefully sorted by category
* New unique and beautiful puzzles every day
* 6 difficulty levels – different challenges for different players
* Rotation mode - rotate any puzzle piece for a more realistic gaming experience
* Intuitive controls for easy puzzle solving
* Different Boosters to make the assembling a little easier:
- Line Booster (fills in the line)
- Column Booster (fills in the column)
- Frame Booster (fills in the frame)
- Magnet Booster (arranges up to 8 pieces in one click).

Take advantage of the Premium Features:
* Double daily bonus
* Twice as many coins for solved puzzles
* All levels of difficulty for advanced players
* Ad-free puzzle solving experience

Jigsaw Puzzles - will you accept the challenge of solving them all?

* Choose from different subscription options. Our standard subscription options are:
1-month Subscription with 3-day free trial
1-year Subscription
* Your free trial subscription will automatically renew to a paid subscription. You can cancel your subscription in the iTunes settings at least 24-hours before the end of the free trial period. Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term.
* Please note: any unused portion of a free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period.
* You can cancel a free trial or subscription anytime by turning off auto-renewal through your iTunes account settings. This must be done 24 hours before the end of a free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period, and you will be downgraded to the free service.
* You can access a free version of Jigsaw Puzzles for Me without subscribing to the above options.

For complete access to all Jigsaw Puzzles features, you will need to allow access to the following:
*Notifications - so that you will be kept informed when New or Special jigsaw puzzles are added to the app.
